module.p:
Corpus examples (conditional) –
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. Tha e iomchuidh aig an àm gun tugamaid tarraing air a’ chuspair so.
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. It is pertinent at the [present] time that we [would] comment upon this subject. td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’
